text: The Incredible Hulk is a 2008 American superhero movie directed by Louis Leterrier and based on the Marvel character Hulk by Stan Lee. It is a reboot to the 2003 movie and the second movie of the Marvel Cinematic Universe. == Plot == Bruce Banner has been staying at Brazil to find a way to suppress his anger. == Cast == *Edward Norton as Bruce Banner *Liv Tyler as Betty Ross *William Hurt as General Thunderbolt Ross *Tim Roth as Emil Blonsky / Abomination *Ty Burrell as Leonard Samson *Tim Blake Nelson as Samuel Sterns *Robert Downey Jr. as Tony Stark == References == ==Other websites== * * * Category:2008 action movies Category:English-language movies Category:2000s superhero movies Category:Hulk (Marvel Comics) Category:Marvel Cinematic Universe: Phase One movies Category:Movies based on works by Stan Lee Category:Movies set in New York (state) Category:Movies set in Brazil Category:Multilingual movies Category:Reboot movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:American superhero movies Category:American action movies Category:Movies directed by Louis Leterrier
